general.description: It's a nickname, of course. How could it not be? Trouble is, nobody remembers where the name came from, and, bizarrely, there are no records of the station's original name. It's quite a famous story, both within Hekaras and elsewhere. Meanwhile, all involved simply call it Three and a Half Kings. It seems to work for them. Despite the curious name, Three and a Half Kings is a fairly unremarkable station, offering its services to ships that pass by.
general.bar: This is a typical station-side bar. It has viewports looking into space, which are of course ignored by everyone, since anyone who comes to a station like this has seen all the space they could possibly want to.
